titles.title: To express the sense of the House of Representatives regarding actions to stop the poaching of valuable marine resources and use of illegal high seas driftnets in the Bering Sea.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 6/15/1998--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the U.S. and Russian fisheries enforcement agencies and personnel should be commended for maintaining an enforcement presence in the Bering Sea and for taking the necessary action to stop the poaching of valuable marine resources and use of illegal high seas driftnets in the Bering Sea; and (2) this action will send a strong signal to the fishermen of the People's Republic of China and other nations that the illegal use of high seas driftnets will not be tolerated and must stop.
